comment: * Callback class used for clients to receive MIDI device added and removed notifications

methods.name: public void onDeviceAdded(MidiDeviceInfo device)
methods.comment:
* Called to notify when a new MIDI device has been added
         *
         * @param device a {@link MidiDeviceInfo} for the newly added device

methods.name: public void onDeviceRemoved(MidiDeviceInfo device)
methods.comment:
* Called to notify when a MIDI device has been removed
         *
         * @param device a {@link MidiDeviceInfo} for the removed device

methods.name: public void onDeviceStatusChanged(MidiDeviceStatus status)
methods.comment:
* Called to notify when the status of a MIDI device has changed
         *
         * @param status a {@link MidiDeviceStatus} for the changed device
